item.title: 1. Abstraction of NLP - تجريدُ معالجةِ اللغاتِ الطبيعية
item.author: cairo.nlp.group@gmail.com (cAIro|NLP Group)
item.description: We as humans, by nature, understand text “natural language”; machines, by nature, understand numbers (in one way or another numerical representation). If we want to visualize any NLP task, it could be viewed as: Taking text as input. Preprocessing it and getting the numerical representation of this text. Passing it to a model to “understand” the input to extract the needed features and perform the given task. Taking the output from the model, which would be represented as some numerical representation as well, and post-processing it to convert this output into some text (if needed).
